DOC.brief_title: Fronto-limbic Functional Connectivity Via Real-time fMRI Neurofeedback
DOC.detailed_description: In present proof-of-concept study , investigator plan evaluate whether real-time fMRI neurofeedback training enable individual gain volitional control fronto-limbic circuitry . Given circuitry abundantly implicate emotional perception regulation could facilitate emotional control . Suitable participant randomly assign two group i.e . experiment group sham group , experiment group receive feedback reflect fronto-limbic activity pattern , sham group receive random feedback . Both group require regulate neural activity feedback . Subjects receive real feedback expect develop well emotional control training session .
